channel.title: 🏢 Shandong University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Shandong University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Perplexity-aware Correction for Robust Alignment with Noisy Preferences
item.description: PerpCorrect: Robust LLM alignment despite noisy human preferences, achieved via perplexity-based noisy preference detection and correction.

item.title: Resource-Aware Federated Self-Supervised Learning with Global Class Representations
item.description: FedMKD: A multi-teacher framework for federated self-supervised learning, enabling global class representations even with diverse client models and skewed data distributions.
